strains.name: Golden Teacher
strains.blurb: Balanced, uplifting, and deeply introspective without overpowering intensity.
strains.details: Golden Teacher offers a warm, insightful experience with gentle visuals, emotional clarity, and an approachable headspace ideal for beginners or creative exploration.

strains.name: Penis Envy
strains.blurb: Powerful, introspective, and deeply embodied with pronounced emotional depth.
strains.details: This high-potency strain produces strong body sensations, immersive music perception, and heavy introspection. Best suited for experienced users seeking ego-softening or transformative journeys.

strains.name: Enigma
strains.blurb: Otherworldly, dreamy, and reality-bending with soft but surreal visuals.
strains.details: Enigma produces nonlinear thinking, dimensional distortion, and imaginative scene-shifts. Great for users seeking a mystical, cinematic, or metaphysical experience.

strains.name: Full Moon Party
strains.blurb: Energetic, social, vibey, and music-forward with glowing visual enhancement.
strains.details: Designed for movement, connection, dance, and festival-style energy. Enhances rhythm perception, sociability, and sensory sparkle.

strains.name: Amazonian
strains.blurb: Bright, upbeat, and mentally stimulating with a clean body profile.
strains.details: Amazonian delivers a lively, active headspace with crisp visuals and a smooth, functional body load—excellent for daytime outdoor adventures.

strains.name: Cambodian
strains.blurb: Clear, bright, and horizon-widening with light visuals and high mental clarity.
strains.details: Cambodian is known for its clean, mentally spacious effect—great for meditation, nature walks, and deep thought without heavy body sensations.
